name: ring
description: Lerian Studio plugin marketplace: Core software engineering skills (TDD, debugging, code review), specialized developer agents (Backend, DevOps, Frontend, QA, SRE), product planning workflows (9-gate pre-dev system), PMO portfolio governance (portfolio management, resource planning, risk analysis), product marketing specialists (positioning, GTM, launch), FinOps tools with Brazilian regulatory compliance templates, and technical writing specialists for documentation.

plugins.name: ring-default
plugins.description: Core skills library for the Lerian Team: TDD, debugging, collaboration patterns, and proven techniques. Features parallel 3-reviewer code review system (Foundation, Correctness, Safety), systematic debugging, and workflow orchestration. 21 essential skills for software engineering excellence.

plugins.name: ring-dev-team
plugins.description: 7 specialized developer agents + 10 development skills + 5 slash commands: 6-gate development cycle (implementation->devops->SRE->testing->review->validation), integrated with PM team output. Go/TypeScript Backend specialists, DevOps Engineer, Frontend TypeScript specialist, Frontend Designer, QA Analyst, and SRE. Complete development team coverage with TDD, observability, and security best practices.

plugins.name: ring-pm-team
plugins.description: Product team pre-development workflow: 10 skills + 3 research agents. 9-gate planning system with research-first approach (Gate 0) before PRD creation. Includes parallel research agents (repo-research-analyst, best-practices-researcher, framework-docs-researcher) and full planning gates (PRD, feature map, TRD, API, data model, dependencies, tasks, subtasks).

plugins.name: ring-finops-team
plugins.description: Financial operations (FinOps) agents and Brazilian regulatory compliance skills. Includes finops-analyzer and finops-automation agents for financial analysis and automation. Contains regulatory templates for BACEN, RFB, and other Brazilian financial regulations with multi-gate workflow support.

plugins.name: ring-tw-team
plugins.description: Technical writing specialists for functional and API documentation. 3 specialized agents (functional-writer, api-writer, docs-reviewer) and 7 documentation skills covering voice/tone, structure, API field descriptions, and quality review. Enforces clear, consistent documentation standards.

plugins.name: ring-finance-team
plugins.description: Financial operations specialists for FP&A, budgeting, and modeling. 6 financial agents (financial-analyst, budget-planner, financial-modeler, treasury-specialist, accounting-specialist, metrics-analyst) + 8 skills + 3 commands. Complete financial operations covering analysis, budgeting, modeling, treasury, accounting, and metrics with Ring compliance.

plugins.name: ring-ops-team
plugins.description: Production operations and platform engineering specialists. 5 operations agents (platform-engineer, incident-responder, cloud-cost-optimizer, infrastructure-architect, security-operations) + 8 skills + 4 commands. Complete production operations covering incident response, capacity planning, cost optimization, disaster recovery, security audits, platform onboarding, and infrastructure migrations.

plugins.name: ring-pmm-team
plugins.description: Product marketing specialists for go-to-market strategy. 7 PMM skills + 6 specialist agents (market-researcher, positioning-strategist, messaging-specialist, gtm-planner, launch-coordinator, pricing-analyst). Complete GTM workflow from market analysis through launch coordination with positioning, messaging, and pricing strategy.

plugins.name: ring-pmo-team
plugins.description: Project Management Office specialists for portfolio governance. 5 PMO agents (portfolio-manager, resource-planner, governance-specialist, risk-analyst, executive-reporter) + 8 skills + 3 commands. Complete portfolio management with multi-project coordination, resource planning, risk management, governance gates, and executive reporting.
